panels.description: Percentage of time Loki has been available over the last 30 days
panels.title: Uptime [Last 30 Days]

panels.description: Shows the current error budget burn rate for storage operations. A value > 1 indicates the error budget is being consumed faster than allowed.
panels.title: Storage Error Budget Burn Rate

targets.expr: 100 * sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{status_code=~"5.."}[1m])) by (namespace, job, route) / sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count[1m])) by (namespace, job, route) > 10
